channel.title: Zahl Live Community
channel.description: Recent content on Zahl Live Community

item.title: Welcome to the Zahl Live Community
item.description: Hello, World! Zahl Live Community is an educational, vocational and recreational initiative for the public benefit. We maintain Zahl Coin (ℤ) and other related projects. — Zahlatoshi Communito

item.title: About ZAHL
item.description: Zahl Coin (ℤ) is a new experimental cryptocurrency on top of the Stellar blockchain ecosystem. It is a decentralized project that is maintained by Zahl Live Community on the World Wide Web, and is intended to be used for educational, vocational and recreational purposes only. In mathematics, the set of integers is often denoted by the letter “Z”, standing originally for the German word Zahl/Zahlen (“numbers”). An integer is often a primitive data type in computer programming languages, Thus, the project is trying to create an experimental monetary system without floating points.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Join us on https://keybase.io/team/zahlcoin and we will get in touch with you soon!
